thread.title: CDC Director Quits After Report She Bought Tobacco Stocks

author: Betsy McKay
title: CDC Director Quits After Report She Bought Tobacco Stocks
text:
Brenda Fitzgerald, the director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, resigned Wednesday following difficulties unwinding investments in two health-care-related firms and a report she had bought stock in an international tobacco company after assuming her post.
In an interview, Dr. Fitzgerald said she offered her resignation as leader of the nationâ€™s public-health agency in an email Wednesday morning to Health and Human Services Secretary Alex Azar because she felt that the investment issues were detracting from...
